e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-01.title: Redis Kernel Warning in Compose Runtime
e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-01.details: Redis logs warn that vm.overcommit_memory is disabled. Configure host/sysctl so Redis background save/replication is robust under memory pressure.

e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-02.title: Transient Worker Registration Errors During Startup
e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-02.details: alpha/beta emit connection-refused errors to hub during first boot seconds, then register successfully. Reduce noisy error-level logging or add startup backoff/readiness gating.

e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-03.title: UTF-8/Mojibake in Frontend Labels
e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-03.details: Several UI strings render with broken umlauts/symbols (for example in login/MFA components). Normalize file encoding and fix affected literals.

e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-04.title: Live LLM E2E Test Currently Skipped
e2e-improvements-2026-02-09-04.details: Playwright suite reports one skipped test (templates-ai-live @requires-llm). Add CI profile/environment that can run this test or document skip expectations explicitly.
